titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the standard mileage rate deduction for charitable use of passenger automobiles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E881)

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the standard mileage rate deduction for charitable use of a passenger automobile. Provides that the Secretary must adjust such standard mileage rate consistent with an adjustment to the business standard mileage rate for any period after 1993.
